commit.message:
Rollup merge of #60190 - nnethercote:less-metadata-gen, r=alexcrichton

Don't generate unnecessary rmeta files.

As per https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/60006#issuecomment-484284191.

r? @alexcrichton
